channel.title: How do i get my server online with no-ip
channel.description: i have downloaded everything and done port forwarding i even used a program were u dont have to port forward and i cant get my server online i have to use 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 to log in and nobody else can log in on on diferent computers so its like local if u want u can make the server your self and ill send you the source of you can tell me how to fix it i will make you co-owner if you help

item.title: How do i get my server online with no-ip

@crying_no_mo wrote:

[quote=“jenjen, post:14, topic:225322”]ha i finally get what hes talking about…u cant connect to example.no-ip.ortg from your local host thats for other ppl u connect through 127.0.0.1[/quote]he could connect through his ip or the local host 127.0.0.1 he most likely didnt portforward his router thats why it most likely isnt working as i just said.

item.title: How do i get my server online with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @_Pure_Pwnage ~!Pure Pwnage!~
item.description:
@_Pure_Pwnage wrote:

you connect to 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 - thats local host.
other people have to connect to your external ip.

go to google.
look up “my ip”
copy that ip and get people to connect to that.
also use that for your no-ip

Read full topic

item.title: How do i get my server online with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @pkf0rl1f3 pkf0rl1f3
item.description:
@pkf0rl1f3 wrote:

here ill help

go to

http://www.no-ip.com/

then

Sign-up Now!

when you are on that create a account

when you are logged in

click at the top
Downloads

Select your operating system and download it

Next -

Log in and click on
Your No-ip
click
Under Hosts \ Redirectsclick add
then

fill out the form
click
create host

then run no-ip and log onto tht once downloaded
then check the little box and if its blushing its working
then

run your server and hopefully it worked

gl on server

Read full topic
